name: BlueBridge One
tag_list: netsuite, cloud-software, saas, software-as-a-service, erp-software, crm-software, ecommerce-software, netsuite-price, netsuite-cost, cost-of-netsuite
overview:
Blue Bridge One is a leading NetSuite solution provider in the UK and a certified NetSuite solution development partner. We are a team of experienced professional consultants providing a range of services, including system implementation, integration, customization, and e-commerce development, training, and support. We have dispensed NetSuite’s cloud-based business management software suite in combination with other value-added business solutions to our huge client base from over 250 growing and mid-sized organizations across varying sectors.

At Blue Bridge One, we employ our NetSuite expertise and knowledge to provide our clients end-to-end business development solutions helping them become more successful. As a premier Netsuite consultant, we aim to deliver higher levels of customer service to meet our customer expectations and also ensure that our customers communicate their positive experiences to other prospective clients.

We are also winners of “NetSuite Global Star Award” from 2005 to 2012.
